description: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 72 mana, 0.3 mana regen and 0.42% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 72 mana, 0.3 mana regen and 0.42% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 72 mana, 0.3 mana regen, 0.42% spell damage and 6 attack damage.
